title: Elegant, sligtly worn swashy serif caps
content:
Hi guys,

Does anyone know what this fancy font is called?  
 [http://img168.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lithiujmwd4.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224013/http:/img168.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lithiujmwd4.gif "http://img168.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lithiujmwd4.gif")

Sorry if the title was a bit lacking.. couldn’t think of any other way to explain it! Lol

Thanks in advance!

 [‹ Looking for a good heart glyph/dingbat](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28771 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Monospaced sans printed from Ricoh printer - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224013/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28691 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Skylar

comments.content: Some of the characters look like [Requiem](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410224013/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/index.html). BTW, you can insert images here, you don’t have to link to an external site.
